short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that fixes the rabbit experience a bit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhances the rabbit experience by fixing various issues with the UI, as well as adding a couple features.
It will allow you to fullscreen to the rabbitcast only, without any of the other rabbit UI.

CTRL+SHIFT+F to activate/deactivate fullscreen mode for rabbit
